title: Fawlty Towers. Hotel inspector. Germans. Touch of class
brief_description: The infamous Torquay hotel, “Fawlty Towers”, presided over by the eminently certifiable Basil Fawlty - played by John Cleese - is the setting for the following three hilarious episodes: “The Hotel Inspector”; “The Germans”; and “A Touch of Class”.
